clause.title: Doors to a fire control room

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Required doors to a fire control room must open into the room, be lockable and located so that persons using escape routes from the building will not obstruct or hinder access to the room.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The fire control room must be accessible via two paths of travel—

ol.li: one from the front entrance of the building; and
one direct from a public place or fire-isolated passageway which leads to a public place and has a door with an FRL of not less than –/120/30.
